Keywords: Animal , Gorilla City , Injustice League , Legion of Doom , Ruler , Secret Society of Super-Villains
Real Name: Grodd
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Elevated
IT'S TIME THE HUMANS LEARN THAT APES ARE THEIR SUPERIOR: UNIQUE MODIFIER - If Gorilla Grodd is on a themed team, friendly characters with the Animal keyword modify attack +1.
I HAVE TAKEN OVER THE DEFENSES OF GORILLA CITY: Leadership, Mind Control. When Gorilla Grodd uses Leadership and succeeds, you may instead generate a WW80 #007 Gorilla Knight on click #1.

April 30, 2021
Organous
Agreed, 150 points is a lot to ask for this guy. At the same time, his 75 point version seems like a bit of a letdown for his points; he just gives you more room to include animals. I've certainly [b]done[/b] it, paid about that much for a sweeping buff through UXM Emma Frost, but that's a lot to ask. However, there's a surprising amount of animals one can include to take advantage of this. My first thought was: time to break out the animal bystander tokens again! And this time, the DC versions don't kill themselves. They won't contribute toward your theme initiative, but they definitely help you swarm up. TMNT 3 Splinter could similarly be a very useful inclusion. Grodd will put him at 12 attack, and once he hits, the rest of your characters will get [b]another[/b] attack buff. A little squishy at 16 D with CR, but also sitting at 4 life for 25. Bear in mind this set also includes Ch'p, a 35 point [b]Green Lantern[/b] animal! But of course, people probably just want to swarm more with Wendigo here...

March 15, 2021
Goop
Its nice he's 12/11 attack through his whole dial but i just dont see him worth it at 150. You aren't going to mc or incap with your primary attacker. You MUST hit your leadership roles so you have some good mastermind fodder. I would only *maybe* consider him at his lower cost and only if i was running a lot of animals.
